1.Cons: work overtime fill ins for people

2.Pros: You always get paid for what you work, flexible schedule

3.Pros: You get discounts on the food
3.Cons: You smell like the food at the end of the work day

6.Summary: "A good job to start out, but not a job to make a career out of"

6.Cons: Not a steady schedule, makes it hard to have a life.

7.Cons: The pay is not great and you never get to sit. As a cashier you still have to keep the bathrooms clean.

8.Cons: do to much for only 8 dollars an hour

9.Pros: Some of the best training available
